title: BRIEF-Conformis Q4 Loss Per Share $0.27
text:
45 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Conformis Q4 Loss Per Share $0.27 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Conformis Inc: 
* CONFORMIS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND THE YEAR ENDED 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS; REITERATES 2018 FINANCIAL GUIDANCE * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.27 * Q4 REVENUE $20.8 MILLION * SEES QUARTERLY REVENUE $19.1 MILLION TO $19.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $79.6 MILLION TO $83.6 MILLION 
* FOR Q1 OF 2018, COMPANY IS ALSO PROVIDING QUARTERLY GUIDANCE OF TOTAL REVENUE IN A RANGE OF $19.1 MILLION TO $19.8 MILLION 
* FOR FULL YEAR 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS TOTAL GROSS MARGIN IN A RANGE OF 44% TO 46% 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.30, REVENUE VIEW $20.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $83.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
